name: Cueyatl Moon Priest
movement: 30 ft. walking, 20 ft. climbing, 30 ft. swimming
description: A small humanoid with a cunning appearance, adept in stealth and camouflage among jungle foliage.
memorable: Its ability to extinguish magical light and deal cold damage in an area makes it a formidable foe.
goals: To manipulate and control its environment and opponents through cunning tactics and magical prowess.
relations: Often associated with other jungle creatures or dark cults that serve lunar deities.
strengths: Exceptional spellcasting abilities and stealth suited for ambush tactics.
weaknesses: Lower physical damage output and reliance on stealth.
attacks: Wields a morningstar, dealing piercing and poison damage, and has area effect cold damage ability.
most_powerful_ability: Night's Chill allows it to extinguish magical light and deal cold damage to enemy creatures nearby.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet and a passive perception score of 16, allowing it to detect hidden threats effectively.
skills: Skilled in medicine, perception, and religion, indicating a proficiency in healing and spiritual matters.
additional_information: Amphibious, able to breathe both air and water.
Advantage on Stealth checks in jungle terrain.
Advantage on checks to escape grapples.
Can jump impressive distances without a running start.
5th-level spellcaster with a range of useful spells.
spellcasting: 5th-level spellcaster with various buffs, damaging spells, and healing abilities prepared.
test_queries: cunning monster with cold damage attacks
